name: Cold and Alone (DaveLikesPasta)
description:
Cold and Alone

You are stranded on a cold, lifeless planet. Build your base, explore with your rover, collect resources and see how long you can survive! Each day is colder than the last, freezing to death is inevitable.

This game is played with the keyboard. Use QWE+ASD to move around, or , and the arrow keys. Or you can use the Numpad.
